reviewText: Not entertaining like Emeril's usual self in his shows...was a bit disappointed about that. He did give great information and the shows were educational but no pizazz...

Wow this is Emeril at his best with all his knowledge and personality we have watched this dvd over and over for entertainment and for solid health and cooking value, go Emeril can't wait for more Emeril DVDs. Thanks from Georgio & Rosemary from Sydney Australia
Emeril is always fun to watch and a great instructor. I recommend this to anyone with an iterest in the culinary arts or simply wanting to become a better cook.
